page.title: 19SHOPPING IN THE COUNTRYSIDE
page.content: Shopping in the country is very expen- sive because the shops are smaller and have to charge more.That is why most people do their bulk shopping in towns.There are three shops in our village which sell food and odds and ends but mainly we go to the nearby towns.The most popular town is Persh- ore,then Tewkesbury, then Cheltenham. Most people go to more than one town. Usually we go in a car so we can take the shopping home easily, anyway we do not have much of a bus service.Some of the large supermarkets are just out- side towns so that parking is much easier.The most popular shopping day is Saturday.In our class most people go shopping with the whole family together.Sometimes we have to go far- ther away to get larger things but we don't go too far.Most people from our class go to the village shops alone.
